Plot: When Salim, a young Indian man, is offered a small business in Central Africa, he accepts. As he strives to establish himself, he becomes closely involved with the fluid and dangerous politics of the newly-dependent state.
Characters: Salim, Metty, Zabeth, Ferdinand (A Bend in the River), Nazruddin, Mahesh, Shoba, Father Huismans, Indar, Raymond (A Bend in the River), Yvette (A Bend in the River)
